text: Tawechete akusigalila munyuma pandema jatim’bigule kuja kuchipanje chakupalagula (cha ku Khaibara) kuti nkachijigale: “Tulekaani tunkuuye.” Akusaka agalawusye malowe ga Allah. Jilani: “Nganim’ba ntukuyiye. Mwele ni muwawechetele kalape Allah.” Basi wanganyao tajile: “(Ngwamba), nambo nkututendela litima.” (Ngwamba), nambo awele akakumanyilila ikaweje panandipe
